price: 107. Okomona o kati na yango ata esika moko ezali ya kogumbama te mpe botombwami te.
arabic: لَّا تَرَىٰ فِيهَا عِوَجٗا وَلَآ أَمۡتٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā tarā fīhā ʿiwajan walā amtan
